original_text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial, and made great lamentation over him.
korean_text: 경건한 사람들이 스데반을 장사하고 위하여 크게 울더라

sentences.original_text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial
sentences.korean_translation: 경건한 사람들이 스테반을 그의 장지로 운구했고

sentences.original_text: and made great lamentation over him
